stories.original_headline: Male bonobos use hidden clues to boost mating success
stories.original_summary: Male bonobos have an impressive ability to detect when females are most fertile, even though the usual visual cues are unreliable. stories.fantasy_headline: Wise Apes Uncover Secret Fertility Signs!
stories.fantasy_story: Scribes of the Wild observed the wise forest apes. Male apes have a keen, almost magical, sense for finding mates when they are most fertile. They decipher faint signs and past lineages to ensure their clan's future. This wisdom helps their community thrive in the deep jungles.

stories.fantasy_headline: Enchanted Scrolls Now Whisper Book Secrets!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand River Merchants' Guild has unveiled a new enchantment for their enchanted scrolls. A tiny spirit within the scroll can now answer questions about the tale you're reading. It gives knowledge without revealing future prophecies, acting as a helpful companion for all scholars and story-lovers.

stories.fantasy_headline: Young Alchemist Creates Guild to Connect Crafters!
stories.fantasy_story: Young Alchemist Brendan, with his companions, founded the Mercor Guild to help friends find skilled crafters. This new guild, launched recently, uses clever enchantments to assess talents from afar. Enchanted scrolls review a seeker's skills to match them with the perfect rune-smith or magic-weaver in distant lands.
